DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Department Burn
Typology Group Burn
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[
    {
        "WidgetSubTitle": "Forecast vs Actual Time",
        "WidgetType": "chart",
        "WidgetFilterField": "",
        "WidgetColor": "#efefef",
        "WidgetHeight": 200,
        "WidgetHeader": {
            "showContextInfo": false,
            "WidgetPeriodChooser": {
                "type": "year",
                "visible": false
            },
            "WidgetMetrics": {
                "visible": true,
                "Metrics": [
                    {
                        "visible": true,
                        "metricName": "# Forecast",
                        "metricFieldValue": "ForecastTimeGrandTotal"
                    },
                    {
                        "visible": true,
                        "metricName": "# Actual",
                        "metricFieldValue": "ActualTimeGrandTotal"
                    },
                    {
                        "visible": true,
                        "metricName": "# Actual (Billable)",
                        "metricFieldValue": "ActualBillableGrandTotal"
                    },
                    {
                        "visible": true,
                        "metricName": "# Actual (Non Billable)",
                        "metricFieldValue": "ActualNonBillableGrandTotal"
                    }
                ]
            },
            "showSubTitle": true,
            "showTitle": true
        },
        "WidgetDataSources": {
            "main": {
                "type": "querytext",
                "value": "With ProjectYearMonths As
                                (
	                                select @ProjectId as ProjectId, 
	                                ym.* 
	                                from YearsMonths(
	                                (select p.BeginDate from Project p where p.Oid = @ProjectId), 
	                                (select p.EndDate from Project p where p.Oid = @ProjectId)) ym
                                ),
                                PlannedAndContracted AS
                                (
	                                select	v.UserTypologyGroupId as TypologyGroupId,
					                                isnull(sum(v.PlannedHours), 0) as PlannedTime,
					                                isnull(sum(sum(v.PlannedHours)) OVER (ORDER BY v.UserTypologyGroupId), 0) AS PlannedTimeRunningTotal,
					                                isnull(sum(sum(v.PlannedHours)) OVER (), 0) AS PlannedGrandTotal,
					                                isnull(sum(v.PlannedHoursSell), 0) as PlannedSell,
					                                isnull(sum(sum(v.PlannedHoursSell)) OVER (ORDER BY v.UserTypologyGroupId), 0) AS PlannedSellRunningTotal,
					                                isnull(sum(sum(v.PlannedHoursSell)) OVER (), 0) AS PlannedSellGrandTotal,
					                                isnull(sum(v.ContractedHours), 0) as ContractedTime,
					                                isnull(sum(sum(v.ContractedHours)) OVER (ORDER BY v.UserTypologyGroupId), 0) AS ContractedTimeRunningTotal,
					                                isnull(sum(sum(v.ContractedHours)) OVER (), 0) AS ContractedTimeGrandTotal,
					                                isnull(max(v.ContractedHoursRate), 0) as ContractedRate 
			                                from	SkillAnalyticsBurnRate v
	                                where	1 = 1 
			                                /*[ProjectFilter]*/ and v.ProjectId = @ProjectId /*[/ProjectFilter]*/
	                                group by v.UserTypologyGroupId
                                )
                                select	(utg.[Name]) as TypologyGroup ,
		                                v.*,
		                                pc.PlannedTime,
		                                pc.PlannedTimeRunningTotal,
		                                pc.PlannedGrandTotal,
		                                pc.PlannedSell,
		                                pc.PlannedSellRunningTotal,
		                                pc.PlannedSellGrandTotal,
		                                pc.ContractedTime,
		                                pc.ContractedTimeRunningTotal,
		                                pc.ContractedTimeGrandTotal,
		                                pc.ContractedRate
                                from
		                                (
			                                select	v.UserTypologyGroupId as TypologyGroupId,
					                                concat(FORMAT(pym.[Month], '0#'), '/', pym.[Year]) as MonthYear,
					                                pym.YearMonth as MonthYearNumber,
					                                isnull(sum(v.ActualHours), 0) as ActualTime,
					                                isnull(sum(sum(v.ActualHours)) OVER (ORDER BY v.UserTypologyGroupId, pym.YearMonth), 0) AS ActualTimeRunningTotal,
					                                isnull(sum(sum(v.ActualHours)) OVER (), 0) AS ActualTimeGrandTotal,
													isnull(sum(sum(v.ActualHoursBillable)) OVER () ,0) AS ActualBillableGrandTotal,
													isnull(sum(sum(v.ActualHoursNonBillable)) OVER () ,0) AS ActualNonBillableGrandTotal,
					                                isnull(sum(v.ActualHoursCost), 0) as ActualCost,
					                                isnull(sum(sum(v.ActualHoursCost)) OVER (ORDER BY v.UserTypologyGroupId, pym.YearMonth), 0) AS ActualCostRunningTotal,
					                                isnull(sum(sum(v.ActualHoursCost)) OVER (), 0) AS ActualCostGrandTotal,
					                                isnull(sum(v.ActualHoursSell), 0) as ActualSell,
					                                isnull(sum(sum(v.ActualHoursSell)) OVER (ORDER BY v.UserTypologyGroupId, pym.YearMonth), 0) AS ActualSellRunningTotal,
					                                isnull(sum(sum(v.ActualHoursSell)) OVER (), 0) AS ActualSellGrandTotal,
					                                isnull(sum(v.ForecastHours), 0) as ForecastTime,
					                                isnull(sum(sum(v.ForecastHours)) OVER (ORDER BY v.UserTypologyGroupId, pym.YearMonth), 0) AS ForecastTimeRunningTotal,
					                                isnull(sum(sum(v.ForecastHours)) OVER (), 0) AS ForecastTimeGrandTotal,
					                                isnull(sum(v.ForecastHoursSell), 0) as ForecastSell,
					                                isnull(sum(sum(v.ForecastHoursSell)) OVER (ORDER BY v.UserTypologyGroupId, pym.YearMonth), 0) AS ForecastSellRunningTotal,
					                                isnull(sum(sum(v.ForecastHoursSell)) OVER (), 0) AS ForecastSellGrandTotal,
					                                isnull(max(v.PlannedHours), 0) as PlannedTime,
					                                isnull(max(sum(v.PlannedHours)) OVER (PARTITION BY v.UserTypologyGroupId), 0) AS PlannedTimeRunningTotal,
					                                isnull(sum(v.AllocatedHours), 0) as AllocatedTime,
					                                isnull(sum(sum(v.AllocatedHours)) OVER (ORDER BY pym.YearMonth), 0) AS AllocatedTimeRunningTotal,
					                                isnull(sum(sum(v.AllocatedHours)) OVER (), 0) AS AllocatedTimeGrandTotal,
					                                isnull(sum(v.AllocatedHoursSell), 0) as AllocatedSell,
					                                isnull(sum(sum(v.AllocatedHoursSell)) OVER (ORDER BY pym.YearMonth), 0) AS AllocatedSellRunningTotal,
					                                isnull(sum(sum(v.AllocatedHoursSell)) OVER (), 0) AS AllocatedSellGrandTotal
			                                from	ProjectYearMonths pym
					                                left outer join SkillAnalyticsBurnRate v on 
					                                (v.ProjectId = pym.ProjectId and 
						                                (
							                                v.[Year] is not null and
							                                v.[Month] is not null and 
							                                (v.[Year] = pym.[Year] and v.[Month] = pym.[Month])
						                                )
					                                ),
					                                Project p,
					                                CommercialClient cc
			                                where	pym.ProjectId = p.Oid and 
					                                p.Client = cc.Oid
					                                /*[ProjectFilter]*/ and pym.ProjectId = @ProjectId /*[/ProjectFilter]*/
			                                group by v.UserTypologyGroupId, 
					                                pym.[Year],
					                                pym.[Month],
					                                pym.YearMonth
		                                ) v,
		                                PlannedAndContracted pc,
		                                UserTypologyGroup utg 
                                where	v.TypologyGroupId = utg.Oid and
		                                v.TypologyGroupId = pc.TypologyGroupId"
            }
        },
        "Filters": {},
        "QueryConfiguration": {
            "RequiredFilters": [
                "projectId"
            ]
        }
    }
]

DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Revenue Burn
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"Planned Revenue vs Actual Cost","WidgetType":"chart","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"","WidgetHeight":200,"WidgetHeader":{"showContextInfo":false,"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"type":"year","visible":false},"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":true,"Metrics":[{"visible":true,"metricName":"# Revenue","metricFieldValue":"ForecastSellGrandTotal"},{"visible":true,"metricName":"# Cost","metricFieldValue":"ActualCostGrandTotal"}]},"showSubTitle":true,"showTitle":true},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"With ProjectYearMonths As
(
    select @ProjectId as ProjectId, 
    ym.* 
    from YearsMonths(
    (select p.BeginDate from Project p where p.Oid = @ProjectId), 
    (select p.EndDate from Project p where p.Oid = @ProjectId)) ym
),
PlannedAndContracted AS
(
    select	v.[Year],
            v.[Month],
                    isnull(sum(v.PlannedHours), 0) as PlannedTime,
                    isnull(sum(sum(v.PlannedHours)) OVER (ORDER BY v.[Year], v.[Month]), 0) AS PlannedTimeRunningTotal,
                    isnull(sum(sum(v.PlannedHours)) OVER (), 0) AS PlannedGrandTotal,
                    isnull(sum(v.PlannedHoursSell), 0) as PlannedSell,
                    isnull(sum(sum(v.PlannedHoursSell)) OVER (ORDER BY v.[Year], v.[Month]), 0) AS PlannedSellRunningTotal,
                    isnull(sum(sum(v.PlannedHoursSell)) OVER (), 0) AS PlannedSellGrandTotal,
                    isnull(sum(v.ContractedHours), 0) as ContractedTime,
                    isnull(sum(sum(v.ContractedHours)) OVER (ORDER BY v.[Year], v.[Month]), 0) AS ContractedTimeRunningTotal,
                    isnull(sum(sum(v.ContractedHours)) OVER (), 0) AS ContractedTimeGrandTotal,
                    isnull(max(v.ContractedHoursRate), 0) as ContractedRate 
            from	SkillAnalyticsBurnRate v
    where	v.[Year] is null and v.[Month] is null 
            /*[ProjectFilter]*/ and v.ProjectId = @ProjectId /*[/ProjectFilter]*/
    group by v.[Year],
            v.[Month]
)
select
    v.MonthYear,
    IIF(n.RoleId is not null, v.ForecastSell, null) as ForecastSell,
    IIF(n.RoleId is not null, v.ActualCost, null) as ActualCost,
    IIF(n.RoleId is not null, v.ForecastSellRunningTotal, null) as ForecastSellRunningTotal,
    IIF(n.RoleId is not null, v.ActualCostRunningTotal, null) as ActualCostRunningTotal,
    IIF(n.RoleId is not null, v.ForecastSellGrandTotal, null) as ForecastSellGrandTotal,
    IIF(n.RoleId is not null, v.ActualCostGrandTotal, null) as ActualCostGrandTotal
from
(
    select	v.*,
        pc.PlannedTime,
        pc.PlannedTimeRunningTotal,
        pc.PlannedGrandTotal,
        pc.PlannedSell,
        pc.PlannedSellRunningTotal,
        pc.PlannedSellGrandTotal,
        pc.ContractedTime,
        pc.ContractedTimeRunningTotal,
        pc.ContractedTimeGrandTotal,
        pc.ContractedRate
    from
        (
            select	concat(FORMAT(pym.[Month], '0#'), '/', pym.[Year]) as MonthYear,
                        pym.YearMonth as MonthYearNumber,
                        isnull(sum(v.ActualHours), 0) as ActualTime,
                        isnull(sum(sum(v.ActualHours)) OVER (ORDER BY pym.YearMonth), 0) AS ActualTimeRunningTotal,
                        isnull(sum(sum(v.ActualHours)) OVER (), 0) AS ActualTimeGrandTotal,
                        isnull(sum(v.ActualHoursCost), 0) as ActualCost,
                        isnull(sum(sum(v.ActualHoursCost)) OVER (ORDER BY pym.YearMonth), 0) AS ActualCostRunningTotal,
                        isnull(sum(sum(v.ActualHoursCost)) OVER (), 0) AS ActualCostGrandTotal,
                        isnull(sum(v.ActualHoursSell), 0) as ActualSell,
                        isnull(sum(sum(v.ActualHoursSell)) OVER (ORDER BY pym.YearMonth), 0) AS ActualSellRunningTotal,
                        isnull(sum(sum(v.ActualHoursSell)) OVER (), 0) AS ActualSellGrandTotal,
                        isnull(sum(v.ActualHoursBillable), 0) as ActualBillableTime,
                        isnull(sum(sum(v.ActualHoursBillable)) OVER (ORDER BY pym.YearMonth), 0) AS ActualBillableTimeRunningTotal,
                        isnull(sum(sum(v.ActualHoursBillable)) OVER (), 0) AS ActualBillableTimeGrandTotal,
                        isnull(sum(v.ActualHoursBillableCost), 0) as ActualBillableCost,
                        isnull(sum(sum(v.ActualHoursBillableCost)) OVER (ORDER BY pym.YearMonth), 0) AS ActualBillableCostRunningTotal,
                        isnull(sum(sum(v.ActualHoursBillableCost)) OVER (), 0) AS ActualBillableCostGrandTotal,
                        isnull(sum(v.ActualHoursBillableSell), 0) as ActualBillableSell,
                        isnull(sum(sum(v.ActualHoursBillableSell)) OVER (ORDER BY pym.YearMonth), 0) AS ActualBillableSellRunningTotal,
                        isnull(sum(sum(v.ActualHoursBillableSell)) OVER (), 0) AS ActualBillableSellGrandTotal,
                        isnull(sum(v.ActualHoursNonBillable), 0) as ActualNonBillableTime,
                        isnull(sum(sum(v.ActualHoursNonBillable)) OVER (ORDER BY pym.YearMonth), 0) AS ActualNonBillableTimeRunningTotal,
                        isnull(sum(sum(v.ActualHoursNonBillable)) OVER (), 0) AS ActualNonBillableTimeGrandTotal,
                        isnull(sum(v.ActualHoursNonBillableCost), 0) as ActualNonBillableCost,
                        isnull(sum(sum(v.ActualHoursNonBillableCost)) OVER (ORDER BY pym.YearMonth), 0) AS ActualNonBillableCostRunningTotal,
                        isnull(sum(sum(v.ActualHoursNonBillableCost)) OVER (), 0) AS ActualNonBillableCostGrandTotal,
                        isnull(sum(v.ActualHoursNonBillableSell), 0) as ActualNonBillableSell,
                        isnull(sum(sum(v.ActualHoursNonBillableSell)) OVER (ORDER BY pym.YearMonth), 0) AS ActualNonBillableSellRunningTotal,
                        isnull(sum(sum(v.ActualHoursNonBillableSell)) OVER (), 0) AS ActualNonBillableSellGrandTotal,
                        isnull(sum(v.ForecastHours), 0) as ForecastTime,
                        isnull(sum(sum(v.ForecastHours)) OVER (ORDER BY pym.YearMonth), 0) AS ForecastTimeRunningTotal,
                        isnull(sum(sum(v.ForecastHours)) OVER (), 0) AS ForecastTimeGrandTotal,
                        isnull(sum(v.ForecastHoursSell), 0) as ForecastSell,
                        isnull(sum(sum(v.ForecastHoursSell)) OVER (ORDER BY pym.YearMonth), 0) AS ForecastSellRunningTotal,
                        isnull(sum(sum(v.ForecastHoursSell)) OVER (), 0) AS ForecastSellGrandTotal,
                        isnull(sum(v.AllocatedHours), 0) as AllocatedTime,
                        isnull(sum(sum(v.AllocatedHours)) OVER (ORDER BY pym.YearMonth), 0) AS AllocatedTimeRunningTotal,
                        isnull(sum(sum(v.AllocatedHours)) OVER (), 0) AS AllocatedTimeGrandTotal,
                        isnull(sum(v.AllocatedHoursSell), 0) as AllocatedSell,
                        isnull(sum(sum(v.AllocatedHoursSell)) OVER (ORDER BY pym.YearMonth), 0) AS AllocatedSellRunningTotal,
                        isnull(sum(sum(v.AllocatedHoursSell)) OVER (), 0) AS AllocatedSellGrandTotal
                from	ProjectYearMonths pym
                        left outer join SkillAnalyticsBurnRate v on 
                            (v.ProjectId = pym.ProjectId and 
                                v.[Year] is not null and 
                                v.[Month] is not null and 
                                cast(concat(v.[Year], FORMAT(v.[Month], '0#')) as int) = pym.YearMonth),
                        Project p,
                        CommercialClient cc
                where	pym.ProjectId = p.Oid and 
                        p.Client = cc.Oid
                        /*[ProjectFilter]*/ and pym.ProjectId = @ProjectId /*[/ProjectFilter]*/
                group by pym.[Year],
                        pym.[Month],
                        pym.YearMonth
    ) v,
    PlannedAndContracted pc
) v
    left outer join Analytics.[Authorization](@CurrentUserId) n ON (n.RoleName = 'RateCardRead')"}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"RequiredFilters":["projectId"]}}]

DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Time Burn
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"Contracted vs Actual Time","WidgetType":"chart","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"","WidgetHeight":200,"WidgetHeader":{"showContextInfo":false,"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"type":"year","visible":false},"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":true,"Metrics":[{"visible":true,"metricName":"# Contracted","metricFieldValue":"ContractedTimeGrandTotal"},{"visible":true,"metricName":"# Actual (Billable)","metricFieldValue":"ActualBillableTimeGrandTotal"},{"visible":true,"metricName":"# Actual (Non Billable)","metricFieldValue":"ActualNonBillableTimeGrandTotal"}]},"showSubTitle":true,"showTitle":true},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"With ProjectYearMonths As
                                (
	                                select @ProjectId as ProjectId, 
	                                ym.* 
	                                from YearsMonths(
	                                (select p.BeginDate from Project p where p.Oid = @ProjectId), 
	                                (select p.EndDate from Project p where p.Oid = @ProjectId)) ym
                                ),
                                PlannedAndContracted AS
                                (
	                                select	v.[Year],
			                                v.[Month],
					                                isnull(sum(v.PlannedHours), 0) as PlannedTime,
					                                isnull(sum(sum(v.PlannedHours)) OVER (ORDER BY v.[Year], v.[Month]), 0) AS PlannedTimeRunningTotal,
					                                isnull(sum(sum(v.PlannedHours)) OVER (), 0) AS PlannedGrandTotal,
					                                isnull(sum(v.PlannedHoursSell), 0) as PlannedSell,
					                                isnull(sum(sum(v.PlannedHoursSell)) OVER (ORDER BY v.[Year], v.[Month]), 0) AS PlannedSellRunningTotal,
					                                isnull(sum(sum(v.PlannedHoursSell)) OVER (), 0) AS PlannedSellGrandTotal,
					                                isnull(sum(v.ContractedHours), 0) as ContractedTime,
					                                isnull(sum(sum(v.ContractedHours)) OVER (ORDER BY v.[Year], v.[Month]), 0) AS ContractedTimeRunningTotal,
					                                isnull(sum(sum(v.ContractedHours)) OVER (), 0) AS ContractedTimeGrandTotal,
					                                isnull(max(v.ContractedHoursRate), 0) as ContractedRate 
			                                from	SkillAnalyticsBurnRate v
	                                where	v.[Year] is null and v.[Month] is null 
			                                /*[ProjectFilter]*/ and v.ProjectId = @ProjectId /*[/ProjectFilter]*/
	                                group by v.[Year],
			                                v.[Month]
                                )
                                select	v.*,
		                                pc.PlannedTime,
		                                pc.PlannedTimeRunningTotal,
		                                pc.PlannedGrandTotal,
		                                pc.PlannedSell,
		                                pc.PlannedSellRunningTotal,
		                                pc.PlannedSellGrandTotal,
		                                pc.ContractedTime,
		                                pc.ContractedTimeRunningTotal,
		                                pc.ContractedTimeGrandTotal,
		                                pc.ContractedRate
                                from
		                                (
                                            select	concat(FORMAT(pym.[Month], '0#'), '/', pym.[Year]) as MonthYear,
		                                                pym.YearMonth as MonthYearNumber,
		                                                isnull(sum(v.ActualHours), 0) as ActualTime,
						                                isnull(sum(sum(v.ActualHours)) OVER (ORDER BY pym.YearMonth), 0) AS ActualTimeRunningTotal,
						                                isnull(sum(sum(v.ActualHours)) OVER (), 0) AS ActualTimeGrandTotal,
		                                                isnull(sum(v.ActualHoursCost), 0) as ActualCost,
						                                isnull(sum(sum(v.ActualHoursCost)) OVER (ORDER BY pym.YearMonth), 0) AS ActualCostRunningTotal,
						                                isnull(sum(sum(v.ActualHoursCost)) OVER (), 0) AS ActualCostGrandTotal,
		                                                isnull(sum(v.ActualHoursSell), 0) as ActualSell,
						                                isnull(sum(sum(v.ActualHoursSell)) OVER (ORDER BY pym.YearMonth), 0) AS ActualSellRunningTotal,
						                                isnull(sum(sum(v.ActualHoursSell)) OVER (), 0) AS ActualSellGrandTotal,
		                                                isnull(sum(v.ActualHoursBillable), 0) as ActualBillableTime,
						                                isnull(sum(sum(v.ActualHoursBillable)) OVER (ORDER BY pym.YearMonth), 0) AS ActualBillableTimeRunningTotal,
						                                isnull(sum(sum(v.ActualHoursBillable)) OVER (), 0) AS ActualBillableTimeGrandTotal,
		                                                isnull(sum(v.ActualHoursBillableCost), 0) as ActualBillableCost,
						                                isnull(sum(sum(v.ActualHoursBillableCost)) OVER (ORDER BY pym.YearMonth), 0) AS ActualBillableCostRunningTotal,
						                                isnull(sum(sum(v.ActualHoursBillableCost)) OVER (), 0) AS ActualBillableCostGrandTotal,
		                                                isnull(sum(v.ActualHoursBillableSell), 0) as ActualBillableSell,
						                                isnull(sum(sum(v.ActualHoursBillableSell)) OVER (ORDER BY pym.YearMonth), 0) AS ActualBillableSellRunningTotal,
						                                isnull(sum(sum(v.ActualHoursBillableSell)) OVER (), 0) AS ActualBillableSellGrandTotal,
		                                                isnull(sum(v.ActualHoursNonBillable), 0) as ActualNonBillableTime,
                                                        isnull(sum(sum(v.ActualHoursNonBillable)) OVER (), 0) AS ActualNonBillableTimeGrandTotal,
						                                isnull(sum(sum(v.ActualHoursNonBillable)) OVER (ORDER BY pym.YearMonth), 0) AS ActualNonBillableTimeRunningTotal,
		                                                isnull(sum(v.ActualHoursNonBillableCost), 0) as ActualNonBillableCost,
						                                isnull(sum(sum(v.ActualHoursNonBillableCost)) OVER (ORDER BY pym.YearMonth), 0) AS ActualNonBillableCostRunningTotal,
						                                isnull(sum(sum(v.ActualHoursNonBillableCost)) OVER (), 0) AS ActualNonBillableCostGrandTotal,
		                                                isnull(sum(v.ActualHoursNonBillableSell), 0) as ActualNonBillableSell,
						                                isnull(sum(sum(v.ActualHoursNonBillableSell)) OVER (ORDER BY pym.YearMonth), 0) AS ActualNonBillableSellRunningTotal,
						                                isnull(sum(sum(v.ActualHoursNonBillableSell)) OVER (), 0) AS ActualNonBillableSellGrandTotal,
                                                        isnull(sum(v.ForecastHours), 0) as ForecastTime,
						                                isnull(sum(sum(v.ForecastHours)) OVER (ORDER BY pym.YearMonth), 0) AS ForecastTimeRunningTotal,
						                                isnull(sum(sum(v.ForecastHours)) OVER (), 0) AS ForecastTimeGrandTotal,
		                                                isnull(sum(v.ForecastHoursSell), 0) as ForecastSell,
						                                isnull(sum(sum(v.ForecastHoursSell)) OVER (ORDER BY pym.YearMonth), 0) AS ForecastSellRunningTotal,
						                                isnull(sum(sum(v.ForecastHoursSell)) OVER (), 0) AS ForecastSellGrandTotal,
		                                                isnull(sum(v.AllocatedHours), 0) as AllocatedTime,
						                                isnull(sum(sum(v.AllocatedHours)) OVER (ORDER BY pym.YearMonth), 0) AS AllocatedTimeRunningTotal,
						                                isnull(sum(sum(v.AllocatedHours)) OVER (), 0) AS AllocatedTimeGrandTotal,
		                                                isnull(sum(v.AllocatedHoursSell), 0) as AllocatedSell,
						                                isnull(sum(sum(v.AllocatedHoursSell)) OVER (ORDER BY pym.YearMonth), 0) AS AllocatedSellRunningTotal,
						                                isnull(sum(sum(v.AllocatedHoursSell)) OVER (), 0) AS AllocatedSellGrandTotal
                                                from	ProjectYearMonths pym
						                                left outer join SkillAnalyticsBurnRate v on 
							                                (v.ProjectId = pym.ProjectId and 
								                                v.[Year] is not null and 
								                                v.[Month] is not null and 
								                                cast(concat(v.[Year], FORMAT(v.[Month], '0#')) as int) = pym.YearMonth),
						                                Project p,
						                                CommercialClient cc
                                                where	pym.ProjectId = p.Oid and 
		                                                p.Client = cc.Oid
		                                                /*[ProjectFilter]*/ and pym.ProjectId = @ProjectId /*[/ProjectFilter]*/
                                                group by pym.[Year],
		                                                pym.[Month],
						                                pym.YearMonth
	                                ) v,
	                                PlannedAndContracted pc"}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"RequiredFilters":["projectId"]}}]

DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Utilization per User
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"Billable and Non-Billable Actual Hours in % of User Capacity","WidgetType":"grid","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"","WidgetHeight":250,"WidgetHeader":{"showTitle":true,"showSubTitle":true,"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":false,"Metrics":[]},"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"visible":false,"type":"","startDate":null,"endDate":null}},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"select 
	v.JobId,
	v.JobName,
	v.JobType,
	v.ContractedHours,
	IIF(n.RoleId is not null, v.ContractedHoursIncome, null) as ContractedHoursIncome,
	v.PlannedHours,
	IIF(n.RoleId is not null, v.PlannedHoursIncome, null) as PlannedHoursIncome,
	v.ForecastHours,
	IIF(n.RoleId is not null, v.ForecastHoursIncome, null) as ForecastHoursIncome,
	v.ActualHours,
	IIF(n.RoleId is not null, v.ActualHoursIncome, null) as ActualHoursIncome,
	v.BillableHours,
	IIF(n.RoleId is not null, v.BillableHoursIncome, null) as BillableHoursIncome,
	v.NonBillableHours,
	IIF(n.RoleId is not null, v.NonBillableHoursIncome, null) as NonBillableHoursIncome,
	v.ActualPlusForecastHours,
	IIF(n.RoleId is not null, v.ActualPlusForecastIncome, null) as ActualPlusForecastIncome,
	v.ActualBurnPercentageHours,
	IIF(n.RoleId is not null, v.ActualBurnPercentageIncome, null) as ActualBurnPercentageIncome,
	v.ActualPlusForecastBurnPercentage,
	IIF(n.RoleId is not null, v.ActualPlusForecastBurnIncome, null) as ActualPlusForecastBurnIncome
from (
	select
			v.[Job] as JobId,
			d.NameAndExternalId as JobName,
			jt.[Name] as JobType,
			sum(v.ContractedHours) as ContractedHours,
			sum(v.ContractedHoursIncome) as ContractedHoursIncome,
			sum(v.PlannedHours) as PlannedHours,
			sum(v.PlannedHoursIncome) as PlannedHoursIncome,
			sum(v.ForecastHours) as ForecastHours,
			sum(v.ForecastHoursIncome) as ForecastHoursIncome,
			sum(v.ActualHours) as ActualHours,
			sum(v.ActualHoursIncome) as ActualHoursIncome,
			sum(v.BillableHours) as BillableHours,
			sum(v.BillableHoursIncome) as BillableHoursIncome,
			sum(v.NonBillableHours) as NonBillableHours,
			sum(v.NonBillableHoursIncome) as NonBillableHoursIncome,
			sum(v.ActualHours) + sum(v.ForecastHours) as ActualPlusForecastHours,
			sum(v.ActualHoursIncome) + sum(v.ForecastHoursIncome) as ActualPlusForecastIncome,
			IIF(sum(v.ContractedHours) > 0, sum(v.ActualHours) / sum(v.ContractedHours), 0) as ActualBurnPercentageHours,
			IIF(sum(v.ContractedHoursIncome) > 0, sum(v.ActualHoursIncome) / sum(v.ContractedHoursIncome), 0) as ActualBurnPercentageIncome,
			IIF(sum(v.ContractedHours) > 0, (sum(v.ActualHours) + sum(v.ForecastHours)) / sum(v.ContractedHours), 0) as ActualPlusForecastBurnPercentage,
			IIF(sum(v.ContractedHoursIncome) > 0, (sum(v.ActualHoursIncome) + sum(v.ForecastHoursIncome)) / sum(v.ContractedHoursIncome), 0) as ActualPlusForecastBurnIncome
		from (
			select
				v.Job,
				v.UserTypologyGroup,
				v.[User],
				sum(v.[Rate]) as Rate,
				sum(v.ContractedHours) as ContractedHours,
				sum(v.ContractedHours) * sum(v.Rate) as ContractedHoursIncome,
				sum(v.PlannedHours) as PlannedHours,
				sum(v.PlannedHours) * sum(v.Rate) as PlannedHoursIncome,
				sum(v.ForecastHours) as ForecastHours,
				sum(v.ForecastHours) * sum(v.Rate) as ForecastHoursIncome,
				sum(v.ActualHours) as ActualHours,
				sum(v.ActualHours) * sum(v.Rate) as ActualHoursIncome,
				sum(v.BillableHours) as BillableHours,
				sum(v.BillableHours) * sum(v.Rate) as BillableHoursIncome,
				sum(v.NonBillableHours) as NonBillableHours,
				sum(v.NonBillableHours) * sum(v.Rate) as NonBillableHoursIncome
			from (
				select 
					pht.Job,
					pht.UserTypologyGroup,
					pht.[User],
					Max(isnull(pht.SellRate, 0)) as Rate,
					sum(isnull(pht.ContractedMinutes, 0)) / 60.0 as ContractedHours,
					sum(isnull(pht.PlannedMinutes, 0)) / 60.0 as PlannedHours,
					0 as ForecastHours,
					0 as ActualHours,
					0 as BillableHours,
					0 as NonBillableHours
				from 
					PlannedHoursTotal pht
						left outer join Project p on p.Oid = pht.Project
				where
					p.Oid = @ProjectId
				group by
					pht.Job,
					pht.UserTypologyGroup,
					pht.[User]
				union all
				select
					pha.Job,
					pha.UserTypologyGroup,
					pha.[User],
					0 as Rate,
					0 as ContractedHours,
					0 as PlannedHours,
					sum(isnull(pha.AdjustmentMinutes, 0)) / 60.0 as ForecastHours,
					0 as ActualHours,
					0 as BillableHours,
					0 as NonBillableHours
				from
					PlannedHoursAdjustment pha
						left outer join Project p on p.Oid = pha.Project
				where
					p.Oid = @ProjectId
				group by
					pha.Job,
					pha.UserTypologyGroup,
					pha.[User]
				union all
				select
					v.Job,
					v.UserTypologyGroup,
					v.[User],
					0 as Rate,
					0 as ContractedHours,
					0 as PlannedHours,
					0 as ForecastHours,
					sum(v.[Hours]) as ActualHours,
					sum(v.[Hours] - (v.AdministrativeHours + v.NewBusinessHours)) as BillableHours,
					sum(v.NewBusinessHours + v.AdministrativeHours) as NonBillableHours 
				from (
					select
						d.Oid as Job,
						utg.Oid as UserTypologyGroup,
						t.UserResponsibleId as [User],
						iif(t.IsAdministrative = 1, (t.[Hours] / 60.0), 0) as AdministrativeHours,
						IIF(
							(
								case 
									when t.IsAdministrative = 0 and 
									(
										isnull(jc.Billable, 0) = 0 and 
										isnull(pc.Billable, 0) = 0
									)
									then 1 
									else 0 
								end
							) = 1, (t.[Hours] / 60.0), 0
						) as NewBusinessHours,
						IIF(
							(
								case 
									when t.IsAdministrative = 0 and 
									(
										(pc.Billable = 1 and isnull(jc.Billable, 0) = 0)
									) 
									then (t.[Hours] / 60.0) 
									else 0 
								end
							) = 1, (t.[Hours] / 60.0), 0
						) as InternalWorkHours,
						IIF(
							(
								case
									when t.IsAdministrative = 0 and 
									(
										(pc.Billable = 1 or jc.Billable = 1)
									)
									then (t.[Hours] / 60.0) 
									else 0 
								end
							) = 1, (t.[Hours] / 60.0), 0
						) as BillableHours,
						(t.[Hours] / 60.0) as [Hours],
						t.TotalUserCost
					from	
						dbo.SkillTimesheetExpanded t
							inner join Project p ON (p.Oid = t.ProjectId AND p.Oid = @ProjectId)
							left outer join ProjectClassification pc on (pc.Oid = p.Classification)
							left outer join Deliverable d on (d.Oid = t.DeliverableId)
							left outer join JobClassification jc on (jc.Oid = d.Classification)
							left outer join UserTypology tp on (tp.Oid = t.UserTypologyId)
							left outer join UserTypologyGroup utg on (utg.Oid = tp.UserTypologyGroup)
					) v
				group by
					v.Job,
					v.UserTypologyGroup,
					v.[User]
			) v
			group by
				v.Job,
				v.UserTypologyGroup,
				v.[User]
		) v
			left outer join Deliverable d on d.Oid = v.Job
			left outer join JobType jt on jt.Oid = d.JobType
		where 
			d.Project = @ProjectId
		group by 
			v.Job,
			d.NameAndExternalId,
			jt.[Name]
) v
left outer join Analytics.[Authorization](@CurrentUserId) n ON (n.RoleName = 'DeliverablesSellRead')","mapping":""}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"PreviousPeriod":{"Show":false,"KeyFieldName":"","Type":0},"RequiredFilters":[]}}]

DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Division Burn
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[
    {
        "WidgetSubTitle": "Actual Time",
        "WidgetType": "chart",
        "WidgetFilterField": "",
        "WidgetColor": "#efefef",
        "WidgetHeight": 100,
        "WidgetHeader": {
            "showContextInfo": false,
            "WidgetPeriodChooser": {
                "type": "year",
                "visible": false
            },
            "WidgetMetrics": {
                "visible": true,
                "Metrics": [
                    {
                        "visible": true,
                        "metricName": "# Actual (Billable)",
                        "metricFieldValue": "DirectHoursGrandTotal"
                    },
                    {
                        "visible": true,
                        "metricName": "# Actual (Non Billable)",
                        "metricFieldValue": "NewBusinessHoursGrandTotal"
                    }
                ]
            },
            "showSubTitle": true,
            "showTitle": true
        },
        "WidgetDataSources": {
            "main": {
                "type": "querytext",
                "value": "select  v.*,
                       sum(DirectHours) over (order by v.DivisionId) as DirectHoursRunningTotal,
                       sum(DirectHours) over () as DirectHoursGrandTotal,
                       sum(NewBusinessHours) over (order by v.DivisionId) as NewBusinessHoursRunningTotal,
                       sum(NewBusinessHours) over () as NewBusinessHoursGrandTotal,
                       sum(AdministrativeHours) over (order by v.DivisionId) as AdministrativeHoursRunningTotal,
                       sum(AdministrativeHours) over () as AdministrativeHoursGrandTotal,
                       sum(TimeOffHours) over (order by v.DivisionId) as TimeOffHoursRunningTotal,
                       sum(TimeOffHours) over () as TimeOffHoursGrandTotal,
                       sum(TotalHours) over () as GlobalTotalHours
                    from
                    (
                       select t.DivisionId,
                             t.Division as DivisionName,
                             isnull(t.DirectHours, 0.0) as DirectHours,
                             isnull(t.NewBusinessHours, 0.0) as NewBusinessHours,
                             isnull(t.AdministrativeHours, 0.0) as AdministrativeHours,
                             isnull(uv.TimeOffHours, 0.0) as TimeOffHours,
                             isnull(t.[Hours], 0.0) + isnull(uv.TimeOffHours, 0.0) as TotalHours
                       from
                       (
                          select di.Oid as DivisionId,
								di.[Name] as Division,
                                sum(t.[Hours]) as [Hours],
                                (sum(t.[Hours]) - (sum(t.NewBusinessHours) + sum(t.AdministrativeHours))) as DirectHours,
                                sum(t.NewBusinessHours) as NewBusinessHours,
                                sum(AdministrativeHours) as AdministrativeHours
                          from   SkillAnalyticsTimeUtilization t, Department de, Division di
                          where	 1 = 1 and
								t.DepartmentId = de.Oid and
								de.Division = di.Oid
						/*[ProjectFilter]*/ and t.ProjectId = @ProjectId /*[/ProjectFilter]*/
                          group by di.Oid,
								di.[Name]
                       ) t
                       left outer join 
                       (
                          select 
								di.Oid as DivisionId,
								di.[Name] as Division,
                                sum(uv.[Hours]) as TimeOffHours
                          from   SkillAnalyticsLeaves uv, Department de, Division di
	                      where	 1 = 1 and 
								uv.DepartmentId = de.Oid and
								de.Division = di.Oid
                          group by di.Oid,
								di.[Name]
                       )
                       uv on (uv.DivisionId = t.DivisionId)
                    ) v"
            }
        },
        "Filters": {},
        "QueryConfiguration": {
            "PreviousPeriod": {
                "Show": false,
                "KeyFieldName": "",
                "Type": 0
            },
            "RequiredFilters": []
        }
    }
]

DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: User Burn
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"Actual Time","WidgetType":"chart","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"#efefef","WidgetHeight":200,"WidgetHeader":{"showContextInfo":false,"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"type":"year","visible":false},"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":true,"Metrics":[{"visible":true,"metricName":"# Actual (Billable)","metricFieldValue":"DirectHoursGrandTotal"},{"visible":true,"metricName":"# Actual (Non Billable)","metricFieldValue":"NewBusinessHoursGrandTotal"}]},"showSubTitle":true,"showTitle":true},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"select [TOP_MACRO] v.*,
                       sum(DirectHours) over (order by v.EmployeeId) as DirectHoursRunningTotal,
                       sum(DirectHours) over () as DirectHoursGrandTotal,
                       sum(NewBusinessHours) over (order by v.EmployeeId) as NewBusinessHoursRunningTotal,
                       sum(NewBusinessHours) over () as NewBusinessHoursGrandTotal,
                       sum(AdministrativeHours) over (order by v.EmployeeId) as AdministrativeHoursRunningTotal,
                       sum(AdministrativeHours) over () as AdministrativeHoursGrandTotal,
                       sum(TimeOffHours) over (order by v.EmployeeId) as TimeOffHoursRunningTotal,
                       sum(TimeOffHours) over () as TimeOffHoursGrandTotal,
                       sum(TotalHours) over () as GlobalTotalHours
                    from
                    (
                       select t.[UserId] as EmployeeId,
                             t.[User] as EmployeeName,
                             isnull(t.DirectHours, 0.0) as DirectHours,
                             isnull(t.NewBusinessHours, 0.0) as NewBusinessHours,
                             isnull(t.AdministrativeHours, 0.0) as AdministrativeHours,
                             isnull(uv.TimeOffHours, 0.0) as TimeOffHours,
                             isnull(t.[Hours], 0.0) + isnull(uv.TimeOffHours, 0.0) as TotalHours
                       from
                       (
                          select t.[UserId],
                                t.[User],
                                sum(t.[Hours]) as [Hours],
                                (sum(t.[Hours]) - (sum(t.NewBusinessHours) + sum(t.AdministrativeHours))) as DirectHours,
                                sum(t.NewBusinessHours) as NewBusinessHours,
                                sum(AdministrativeHours) as AdministrativeHours
                          from   SkillAnalyticsTimeUtilization t
	                      where	 1 = 1
                                /*[ProjectFilter]*/ and t.ProjectId = @ProjectId /*[/ProjectFilter]*/
                          group by t.[UserId],
                                t.[User]
                       ) t
                       left outer join 
                       (
                          select uv.[UserId],
								uv.[User],
								sum(uv.[Hours]) as TimeOffHours
                          from   SkillAnalyticsLeaves uv
	                      where	 1 = 1
                        group by uv.[UserId],
                                uv.[User]
                       )
                       uv on (uv.[UserId] = t.UserId)
                    ) v"}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"PreviousPeriod":{"Show":false,"KeyFieldName":"","Type":0},"RequiredFilters":[]}}]
